question: Choose the correct statement about Oxalic acid:
option1: It is weaker than acetic acid
option2: Its condensed chemical formula is HOOCCOOH
answer: Its condensed chemical formula is HOOCCOOH
explanation: Oxalic acid is an organic compound with the formula C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>2</sub>O<sub>4</sub>. Its condensed formula is HOOCCOOH. Its acid strength is much greater than that of acetic acid.
